MySQL Improved Extension mysqli
&reftitle.intro;
The mysqli extension allows you to access the functionality provided by MySQL 4.1 and above. More information about the MySQL Database server can be found at &url.mysql;
Documentation for MySQL can be found at &url.mysql.docs;.
Parts of this documentation included from MySQL manual with permissions of MySQL AB.
&reftitle.required;
In order to have these functions available, you must compile PHP with support for the mysqli extension.
The mysqli extension is designed to work with the version 4.1.3 or above of MySQL. For previous versions, please see the MySQL extension documentation.
